argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_hba1 | |- ( A. x ph -> A. x A. x ph ) |
| 2 | 1 | #P_nfi | |- F/ x A. x ph |
\
 ` x ` is not free in ` A. x ph ` .  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 11-Aug-2016.)  (Proof modification is discouraged.) (New usage is discouraged.)
